caption: Divine love interweaves miracles and mundane, turning every moment into a sacred thread in the tapestry of grace.
image_prompt: A luminous, Renaissance-style painting depicting a divine hand weaving golden threads through scenes of daily life—a wedding feast with overflowing wine, fishermen mending nets by a tranquil sea, a healer touching a bent figure, and a family gathered in quiet prayer. The threads glow with celestial light, connecting each moment to a larger, intricate design that hints at a heavenly kingdom. Soft brushstrokes evoke Gerard David’s warmth, with rich colors and tender details that blur the line between the earthly and the eternal.
